attributes.action: Everything Purchased out of Public Funds is Manufactured in Great Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Goverment and every local council purchase Billions of pounds of equipment every year from a pen to a battleship,
I would like to see every department instructed to BUY BRITISH,
It will help unemployment and every worker payes 30% tax so it will help the country out of resession.
